## UsePaginationReturnType.totalPage property

Total page numbers

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly totalPage: number;
```

## Example 1

If perPageSize is 10, and totalSize is 50

```
console.log(totalPage) // 5

```

## Example 2

If perPageSize is 10, and totalSize is 51

```
console.log(totalPage) // 6

```
